      • locationInHitbox

        public static boolean locationInHitbox(HashHitBox hitBox,
                                       org.spongepowered.api.world.Location location)
        checks if the given bukkit location is within hitbox
        Parameters:
        hitBox - the bounding box to check within
        location - the location to check
        Returns:
        True if the player is within the given bounding box

                                         org.spongepowered.api.world.Location location,
                                         double distance)
        Checks if a given Location is within some distance, distance, from a given HitBox
        Parameters:
        hitBox - the hitbox to check
        location - the location to check
        distance -
        Returns:
        True if location is less or equal to 3 blocks from craft

      • sponge2MovecraftLoc

        public static MovecraftLocation sponge2MovecraftLoc(org.spongepowered.api.world.Location bukkitLocation)

        Returns:

      • rotateVec

        public static MovecraftLocation rotateVec(Rotation rotation,
                                          MovecraftLocation movecraftLocation)
        Rotates a MovecraftLocation towards a supplied Rotation. The resulting MovecraftRotation is based on a center of (0,0,0).
        Parameters:
        rotation - the direction to rotate
        movecraftLocation - the location to rotate
        Returns:
        a rotated Movecraft location
